name: Ingridi'Hunt
0:
”Alexa, open Ingridi hunt”
”Alexa, open Ingridi hunt and search for ingredient replacement”
”Alexa, open Ingridi hunt and search a replacement for cream”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ingridi hunt
des:
Ever thought that the food you prepare could be intolerant or if it could hamper the diet your friends or family follow? Here is our skill to find alternatives for the ingredients you use so that you don’t have to worry about preparing food they are allergic to or something that could end up disturbing their diet choices.

The skill aims to provide assistance to the user by helping them to quickly find an alternative ingredient. The skill further refines the accuracy of the alternative by obtaining inputs from the user such as their allergy preferences, type of food in which the ingredient is used in like say desserts, and the food diet followed by the user.

It also gives interesting ingredient replacement tips.

Try saying any of these commands: 
“Alexa, open ingridi hunt”
“Alexa, open ingridi hunt and search for an ingredient replacement”
“Alexa, open ingridi hunt and search a replacement for butter”
“Alexa, open ingridi hunt and search a replacement for butter to make desserts” 
"Alexa, open ingridi hunt and do a quick search to find a replacement for butter"
"Alexa, open ingridi hunt and do a quick search for replacing vanilla extract to make desserts"

Disclaimer:
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
